description.label: Avertissements Missing Index

description.tooltip: Find missing index warnings for cached plans in the current database
description.label: Missing Index warnings

queries.query: SELECT TOP(25) OBJECT_NAME(objectid) AS [ObjectName], query_plan, cp.objtype, cp.usecounts FROM sys.dm_exec_cached_plans AS cp WITH (NOLOCK) CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_query_plan(cp.plan_handle) AS qp WHERE CAST(query_plan AS NVARCHAR(MAX)) LIKE N'%MissingIndex%' AND dbid = DB_ID() ORDER BY cp.usecounts DESC OPTION (RECOMPILE);
